card.name: Abolish
card.property: You may discard a Plains card rather than pay Abolish's mana cost. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As war raged on, the young mages became more direct in their tactics, often at great cost.

card.name: Agent of Shauku
card.property: {1} {B}, Sacrifice a land: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Go ahead. Take it. You'll be so very powerful . . . and what harm can it do?"

card.name: Alexi's Cloak
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Doesn't look like much, does it?"—Alexi, zephyr mage

card.name: Alexi, Zephyr Mage
card.property: {X} {U}, {T}, Discard two cards: Return X target creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Keldons didn't know her name, but they still cursed her in battle.

card.name: Aura Fracture
card.property: Sacrifice a land: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jamuraa's rhystic mages treat magic as their garden, uprooting unwanted spells as bothersome weeds.

card.name: Avatar of Fury
card.property: If an opponent controls seven or more lands, Avatar of Fury costs {6} less to cast. Flying {R}: Avatar of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Avatar of Hope
card.property: If you have 3 or less life, Avatar of Hope costs {6} less to cast. Flying Avatar of Hope can block any number of creatures.

card.name: Avatar of Might
card.property: If an opponent controls at least four more creatures than you, Avatar of Might costs {6} less to cast. Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)

card.name: Avatar of Will
card.property: If an opponent has no cards in hand, Avatar of Will costs {6} less to cast. Flying

card.name: Avatar of Woe
card.property: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, Avatar of Woe costs {6} less to cast. Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Barbed Field
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wherever they went, the Keldons transformed the land into a weapon.

card.name: Blessed Wind
card.property: Target player's life total becomes 20.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fourth wind of ascension is Anointer, deifying the worthy."—Keld Triumphant

card.name: Bog Elemental
card.property: Protection from white At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Bog Elemental unless you sacrifice a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the bog walks, the wise run."—Erissa, bog witch

card.name: Bog Glider
card.property: Flying {T}, Sacrifice a land: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Branded Brawlers
card.property: Branded Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land. Branded Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sword or the lash. Choose."—Akul, Keldon whip sergeant

card.name: Brutal Suppression
card.property: Activated abilities of nontoken Rebels cost an additional "Sacrifice a land" to activate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They no longer care about their own suffering. Show them something worse."—Latulla, Keldon overseer

card.name: Calming Verse
card.property: Destroy all enchantments you don't control. Then, if you control an untapped land, destroy all enchantments you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The chattering forest fell silent as the otherworldly song began.

card.name: Celestial Convergence
card.property: Celestial Convergence enters the battlefield with seven omen counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an omen counter from Celestial Convergence. If there are no omen counters on Celestial Convergence, the player with the highest life total wins the game. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, the game is a draw.

card.name: Chilling Apparition
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Chilling Apparition. Whenever Chilling Apparition deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mortal minds shrivel at its touch.

card.name: Chimeric Idol
card.property: {0}: Tap all lands you control. Chimeric Idol becomes a 3/3 Turtle artifact creature until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After a chimeric idol attacked them, the Keldons smashed all unfamiliar statues.

card.name: Citadel of Pain
card.property: At the beginning of each player's end step, Citadel of Pain deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of untapped lands he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Battle is our religion. This fortress is our temple."—Latulla, Keldon overseer

card.name: Coastal Hornclaw
card.property: Sacrifice a land: Coastal Hornclaw gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jamuraan farmers fear three things above all else: droughts, floods, and hornclaws.

card.name: Coffin Puppets
card.property: Sacrifice two lands: Return Coffin Puppets from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Copper-Leaf Angel
card.property: Flying {T}, Sacrifice X lands: Put X +1/+1 counters on Copper-Leaf Angel.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When Serra made angels, people called her a goddess. My angels are far superior to hers."—Latulla, Keldon overseer

card.name: Darba
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Darba unless you pay {G}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Legend has it the darba gave up its wings in return for an extra stomach.

card.name: Death Charmer
card.property: Whenever Death Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, that creature's controller loses 2 life unless he or she pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It vents the chill of the grave.

card.name: Denying Wind
card.property: Search target player's library for up to seven cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The third wind of ascension is Eliminator, clearing Keld's path to victory."—Keld Triumphant

card.name: Despoil
card.property: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing could grow where the vile smoke had been, and no one could breathe it and live.

card.name: Devastate
card.property: Destroy target land. Devastate deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You're willing to die for your homeland. I'm willing to kill for it."—Latulla, Keldon overseer

card.name: Diving Griffin
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To outrace the griffin—Kipamu expression meaning"to do the impossible"

card.name: Dual Nature
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, its controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature. Whenever a nontoken creature leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens with the same name as that creature. When Dual Nature leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens created with Dual Nature.

card.name: Elephant Resurgence
card.property: Each player creates a green Elephant creature token. Those creatures have "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard."

card.name: Endbringer's Revel
card.property: {4}: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Any player may activate this ability but only any time he or she could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Entangler
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can block any number of creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tell me again," said Latulla, raising her fist, "how just one woman held back an entire Keldon platoon."

card.name: Excavation
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are secrets out there begging to be rediscovered. We just need to look in the right places."—Teferi, planeswalker

card.name: Excise
card.property: Exile target attacking creature unless its controller pays {X}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Creation is no great feat. Anything you make, I can unmake in a heartbeat."—Alexi, zephyr mage

card.name: Fault Riders
card.property: Sacrifice a land: Fault Riders gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They turn geological upheaval into tactical advantage.

card.name: Fen Stalker
card.property: Fen Stalker has fear as long as you control no untapped lands. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As silent as a shadow, and just as hard to flee.

card.name: Fickle Efreet
card.property: Whenever Fickle Efreet attacks or blocks, flip a coin at end of combat. If you lose the flip, an opponent gains control of Fickle Efreet.

card.name: Flameshot
card.property: You may discard a Mountain card rather than pay Flameshot's mana cost. Flameshot deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures.

card.name: Flay
card.property: Target player discards a card at random. Then that player discards another card at random unless he or she pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Keldons would never admit it, but Greel unsettles them, too.

card.name: Flowering Field
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some lands are soothing, and their peace can be felt in the soul.

card.name: Foil
card.property: You may discard an Island card and another card rather than pay Foil's mana cost. Counter target spell.

card.name: Forgotten Harvest
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a land card from your graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Glittering Lion
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion. {3}: Until end of turn, Glittering Lion loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion." Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Glittering Lynx
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx. {2}: Until end of turn, Glittering Lynx loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx." Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Greel's Caress
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Greel's grin is far less loathsome than his touch.

card.name: Greel, Mind Raker
card.property: {X} {B}, {T}, Discard two cards: Target player discards X cards at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You're Latulla's gift to me, and I always play with my presents."

card.name: Gulf Squid
card.property: When Gulf Squid enters the battlefield, tap all lands target player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If it could capture the power it wastes, it would be invincible.

card.name: Hazy Homunculus
card.property: Hazy Homunculus can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an untapped land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They hide in dreams and whispers and faraway thoughts.

card.name: Heightened Awareness
card.property: As Heightened Awareness enters the battlefield, discard your hand. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It startles me how alive one feels on the edge of death."—Barrin, master wizard

card.name: Hollow Warrior
card.property: Hollow Warrior can't attack or block unless you tap an untapped creature you control not declared as an attacking or blocking creature this combat. (This cost is paid as attackers or blockers are declared.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though it moves like a living thing, anyone can tell it lacks a soul—not to mention mercy.

card.name: Infernal Genesis
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Then he or she creates X 1/1 black Minion creature tokens, where X is that card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Inflame
card.property: Inflame deals 2 damage to each creature dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wound, maim, kill: it's all the same to a Keldon.

card.name: Jeweled Spirit
card.property: Flying Sacrifice two lands: Jeweled Spirit gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As he knows all the world completely, the world refuses him harm.

card.name: Jolrael's Favor
card.property: Flash Enchant creature {1}{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "War destroys; nature renews." —Jolrael, empress of beasts

card.name: Jolrael, Empress of Beasts
card.property: {2} {G}, {T}, Discard two cards: All lands target player controls become 3/3 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I need no army. I have Jamuraa."

card.name: Keldon Arsonist
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice two lands: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fields can be replanted. Settlements can be rebuilt. Burn it all."—Latulla, Keldon overseer

card.name: Keldon Battlewagon
card.property: Trample Keldon Battlewagon can't block. When Keldon Battlewagon attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat. Tap an untapped creature you control: Keldon Battlewagon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the power of the creature tapped this way.

card.name: Keldon Berserker
card.property: Whenever Keldon Berserker attacks, if you control no untapped lands, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They fight beyond thought, beyond fear, and beyond mercy.

card.name: Keldon Firebombers
card.property: When Keldon Firebombers enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices all lands he or she controls except for three.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there isn't enough of Jamuraa left to stand on, I will still claim it for Keld."—Latulla, Keldon overseer

card.name: Latulla's Orders
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to defending player, you may destroy target artifact that player controls.

card.name: Latulla, Keldon Overseer
card.property: {X} {R}, {T}, Discard two cards: Latulla, Keldon Overseer deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Lesser Gargadon
card.property: Whenever Lesser Gargadon attacks or blocks, sacrifice a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trod on by a gargadon—Kipamu expression meaning"wiped out"

card.name: Living Terrain
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 5/6 green Treefolk creature that's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldons were accustomed to rugged terrain, but they never expected it to be aggressive.

card.name: Mageta the Lion

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the jungle of war there is always a Lion.

card.name: Mageta's Boon
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Lion roars, his cubs grow stronger.—Kipamu saying

card.name: Mana Vapors
card.property: Lands target player controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scent of magic can rob you of your senses, blinding you to the world.

card.name: Marsh Boa
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though a powerful constrictor, it prefers simply to drown its prey.

card.name: Mercenary Informer
card.property: Mercenary Informer can't be the target of black spells or abilities from black sources. {2}{W}: Put target nontoken Mercenary on the bottom of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The problem with rebels is that they so quickly reject authority.

card.name: Mine Bearer
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Mine Bearer: Destroy target attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Keldons may have explosive tempers, but I have explosives."

card.name: Mirror Strike
card.property: All combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn by target unblocked creature is dealt to its controller instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Enemies can be your weapons or your shields. Simply show them which they are."—The Teachings of Zho

card.name: Mungha Wurm
card.property: You can't untap more than one land during your untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cities have crumbled under its weight.

card.name: Nakaya Shade
card.property: {B}: Nakaya Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made strong by reckless magic. Made horrid by reckless strife.

card.name: Noxious Field
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: This land deals 1 damage to each creature and each player."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ultimately, it became a three-way battle: the land attacked both armies.

card.name: Outbreak
card.property: You may discard a Swamp card rather than pay Outbreak's mana cost. Choose a creature type. All creatures of that type get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Overburden
card.property: Whenever a player puts a nontoken creature onto the battlefield, that player returns a land he or she controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Kipamu League knew what Keld refused to acknowledge: the land could support no more.

card.name: Panic Attack
card.property: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes everyone decides to go for help at the same time.

card.name: Pit Raptor
card.property: Flying, first strike At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Pit Raptor unless you pay {2}{B}{B}.

card.name: Plague Fiend
card.property: Whenever Plague Fiend deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature unless its controller pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the strange plague ravaged Jamuraa, the fiends multiplied.

card.name: Plague Wind
card.property: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The second wind of ascension is Reaver, slaying the unworthy."—Keld Triumphant

card.name: Psychic Theft
card.property: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled. At the beginning of the next end step, if you haven't cast the card, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Pygmy Razorback
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As a rite of passage, Kipamu youths taunt razorbacks with long sticks . . . then flee.

card.name: Quicksilver Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {4}: Return Quicksilver Wall to its owner's hand. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ogg hit wall. Ogg no kill wall. Ogg hate wall"

card.name: Rebel Informer
card.property: Rebel Informer can't be the target of white spells or abilities from white sources. {3}: Put target nontoken Rebel on the bottom of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The problem with mercenaries is that if you can buy their loyalty, others can too.

card.name: Rethink
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Are you sure you want to do that?"

card.name: Reveille Squad
card.property: Whenever one or more creatures attack you, if Reveille Squad is untapped, you may untap all creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To arms To arms The Lion roars"

card.name: Rhystic Cave
card.property: {T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color to your mana pool unless any player pays {1}. Activate this ability only any time you could cast an instant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All mages dip into the same well; some are just in more of a hurry."—Alexi, zephyr mage

card.name: Rhystic Circle
card.property: {1}: Any player may pay {1}. If no one does, the next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The circle buys time—an important commodity in battle.

card.name: Rhystic Deluge
card.property: {U}: Tap target creature unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll rain down on you with the power of magic itself. Then we'll see who prevails."—Alexi, zephyr mage

card.name: Rhystic Lightning
card.property: Rhystic Lightning deals 4 damage to target creature or player unless that creature's controller or that player pays {2}. If he or she does, Rhystic Lightning deals 2 damage to the creature or player.

card.name: Rhystic Scrying
card.property: Draw three cards. Then, if any player pays {2}, discard three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The trick is to ask when no one's listening." —Alexi, zephyr mage

card.name: Rhystic Shield
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn. They get an additional +0/+2 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A shield for one is good. A shield for everyone is even better.

card.name: Rhystic Study
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Friends teach what you want to know. Enemies teach what you need to know.

card.name: Rhystic Syphon
card.property: Unless target player pays {3}, he or she loses 5 life and you gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jamuraan wizards are linked together by magic, a bond that only the wicked dare exploit.

card.name: Rhystic Tutor
card.property: Unless any player pays {2}, search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Any lock can be undone, any secret revealed.

card.name: Rib Cage Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everything it sees it considers food—and with that many eyes, it's not liable to miss much.

card.name: Ribbon Snake
card.property: Flying {2}: Ribbon Snake loses flying until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All snakes slither. Only this one soars.

card.name: Ridgeline Rager
card.property: {R}: Ridgeline Rager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While armies battled across Jamuraa, beasts stalked the high places looking for victims.

card.name: Root Cage
card.property: Mercenaries don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Vintara Forest welcomes its enemies with a crushing embrace.

card.name: Samite Sanctuary
card.property: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Our war is against suffering, not against those who cause it.—Samite creed

card.name: Scoria Cat
card.property: Scoria Cat gets +3/+3 as long as you control no untapped lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a volcano, it too can erupt without warning.

card.name: Search for Survivors
card.property: Reorder your graveyard at random. An opponent chooses a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, exile it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no rest for a Keldon.

card.name: Searing Wind
card.property: Searing Wind deals 10 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first wind of ascension is Forger, burning away impurity."—Keld Triumphant

card.name: Sheltering Prayers
card.property: Basic lands each player controls have shroud as long as that player controls three or fewer lands. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It matters not if the gods hear my prayers. Jamuraa does."

card.name: Shield Dancer
card.property: {2} {W}: The next time target attacking creature would deal combat damage to Shield Dancer this turn, that creature deals that damage to itself instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The harder your strike, the stronger her defense.

card.name: Shrouded Serpent
card.property: Whenever Shrouded Serpent attacks, defending player may pay {4}. If he or she doesn't, Shrouded Serpent can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many travelers have wandered into a fog only to find that it had teeth, claws, and an appetite.

card.name: Silt Crawler
card.property: When Silt Crawler enters the battlefield, tap all lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If they could replenish the land instead of draining it, Jamuraa would be teeming with them.

card.name: Snag
card.property: You may discard a Forest card rather than pay Snag's mana cost. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by unblocked creatures this turn.

card.name: Soul Charmer
card.property: Whenever Soul Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, you gain 2 life unless that creature's controller pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She seeks the warmth of the living.

card.name: Soul Strings
card.property: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand unless any player pays {X}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everyone is manipulated. It's just more obvious with the dead.

card.name: Spiketail Drake
card.property: Flying Sacrifice Spiketail Drake: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The spell will have to wait," said Alexi, pointing up. "Drakes."

card.name: Spiketail Hatchling
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Sacrifice Spiketail Hatchling: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It dodges waves of water to prepare for waves of magic.

card.name: Spitting Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Sacrifice a land: Spitting Spider deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Spore Frog
card.property: Sacrifice Spore Frog: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The end of one life is merely the beginning of thousands more.

card.name: Spur Grappler
card.property: Spur Grappler gets +2/+1 as long as you control no untapped lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grapplers hunt in packs, driving their victims over steep mountain cliffs.

card.name: Squirrel Wrangler

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gnawed to death. Bad way to go."

card.name: Steal Strength
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With each grunt of pain from Haddad, Greel's grin widened.

card.name: Stormwatch Eagle
card.property: Flying Sacrifice a land: Return Stormwatch Eagle to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When eagles leave the sky, sailors leave the sea.

card.name: Sunken Field
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land is heavy with promise, the harvest ripe with betrayal.

card.name: Sword Dancer
card.property: {W} {W}: Target attacking creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most soldiers think of the sword as a weapon. In the hands of Zho monks, swords are also the strongest of shields.

card.name: Task Mage Assembly
card.property: When there are no creatures on the battlefield, sacrifice Task Mage Assembly. {2}: Task Mage Assembly deals 1 damage to target creature. Any player may activate this ability but only any time he or she could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Thresher Beast
card.property: Whenever Thresher Beast becomes blocked, defending player sacrifices a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It destroys everything in its path, including the path itself.

card.name: Thrive
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We wait and watch, and as we prepare for war, we grow strong."

card.name: Trenching Steed
card.property: Sacrifice a land: Trenching Steed gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Keldons took several of the steeds as trophies of war. They'd never seen such a light beast stand so firm.

card.name: Troubled Healer
card.property: Sacrifice a land: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Which is worse: nothing to defend, or no one to defend it?"

card.name: Troublesome Spirit
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your end step, tap all lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As erratic and turbulent as a summer squall.

card.name: Verdant Field
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jolrael tends the land so that the land will tend the beasts.

card.name: Veteran Brawlers
card.property: Veteran Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land. Veteran Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death awaits them on both fronts.

card.name: Vintara Elephant
card.property: Trample {3}: Vintara Elephant loses trample until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trained with the aid of rhystic magic, they become uneasy in its absence.

card.name: Vintara Snapper
card.property: Vintara Snapper has shroud as long as you control no untapped lands. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The snapper is still when all else movesAnd strikes when all are dozing."—Tales of the Vintara Forest

card.name: Vitalizing Wind
card.property: Creatures you control get +7/+7 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fifth wind of ascension is Exalter, fulfilling Keld's destiny."—Keld Triumphant

card.name: Wall of Vipers
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {3}: Destroy Wall of Vipers and target creature it's blocking. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What wall can never be climbed, but is always scaled?—Nakaya riddle

card.name: Well of Discovery
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if you control no untapped lands, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you have given everything, then you are capable of anything.—Well inscription

card.name: Well of Life
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if you control no untapped lands, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you have given everything, then you have everything to gain.—Well inscription

card.name: Whip Sergeant
card.property: {R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldon soldiers learn to move faster than the whip.

card.name: Whipstitched Zombie
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Whipstitched Zombie unless you pay {B}.

card.name: Wild Might
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. That creature gets an additional +4/+4 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hunted can become the fiercest hunters.

card.name: Windscouter
card.property: Flying When Windscouter attacks or blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These nimble ships were designed for hit-and-run tactics.

card.name: Wing Storm
card.property: Wing Storm deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of creatures with flying that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A thousand wings beating as one can choke the sky itself.

card.name: Wintermoon Mesa
card.property: Wintermoon Mesa enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wintermoon Mesa: Tap two target lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dark is light and day is nightWhen the winter moon shines.

card.name: Withdraw
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Then return another target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We outnumber them Charge Charge Hey, where'd you guys go? Retreat Retreat"

card.name: Zerapa Minotaur
card.property: First strike {2}: Zerapa Minotaur loses first strike until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no difference between bone and crystal when it's piercing your throat.
